general.gigTitle: design a responsive website in react js and next js as a web developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Design Build Deploy I've got you covered
sellerCard.description: I am a professional Full Stack Web developer. I have 4 years of experience working with React JS, Django Rest framework and Node JS. From design to implementation I will do my best to create stunning UI designs in React JS and HTML, CSS etc.

description.content:
We will design a responsive website in React and Next js. An attractive, responsive, modern-looking, and fast web app is important for any business or project so users can have a smooth experience.

  • Do you need your design (Figma, PNG, JPG) converted file to React?
  • Do you need your HTML website converted to React/Next JS?
  • Do you need a full-stack web app in React/Next, Node, Express or Django?

If your answer is Yes, you've come to the right gig!


ï»¿We are a team of qualified web developers, each with over 4 years of experience.

Here are the Services we offer:

  • React JS, Next JS, Javascript
  • Node JS, Express
  • Django Rest Framework
  • Redux
  • Material UI, Tailwind CSS
  • Landing Page
  • Fully Responsive design
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • User friendly
  • Figma to React/Next JS
  • AWS, Docker


TECHNOLOGIES WE CAN WORK WITH :

  • JavaScript, React js, Next js
  • Node JS, Express
  • Django Rest Framework
  • AWS Services.
  • MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
  • HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI etc.


WHY ME?

  • Quality Work
  • 24/7 Available
  • FAST DELIVERY
  • Quick Updates on projects in the form of video or screenshots


KINDLY CONTACT ME BEFORE PLACING AN ORDER

If the project description is complex we can have a meeting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is React JS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: React is an open-source, front end, JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why React JS is the best option?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: React JS allows us to create reusable UI components. React allows developers to create large web applications that can change data, without reloading the page. The main purpose of React is to be fast, scalable, and simple.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also create backend for React JS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can create a Django rest framework backend with React JS.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you use Firebase with React JS?
Can we do a meeting so I can explain requirements and show some examples?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If requirements are complex we can also have a zoom/skype/meets meeting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How fast can you deliver?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Depends on the project and the design. Though we can build up a working prototype very fast.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create website in Next JS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we work with Next JS and React JS.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What styles do you use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can use CSS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and Material UI.
